column1: Business with Supply Chain Management - MSc
column2: University of the West of England, Bristol
column5: Whatever your background or undergraduate degree subject area, this course will equip you with a wide range of practical business skills, with a particular focus on supply chain management, including global supply chain management and sustainable procurement.The manager's role has become increasingly challenging with intense competition, increasing expectations, sustainability, innovation, technology change and alliances all making managers tasks ever more complex and demanding. Yet with the ability to deal confidently with challenges like these, you can look forward to a rewarding future in virtually any organisation.
column7: Home Annual (Per Year) Fee £10000 Home Module Fee (15 Credit) £833
